name: Cavity Caves
description:
UPDATE: There is a bug. You can't finish the level.. I didn't give enough time to build and  playtest. Couldn't get the web version to work in time.

Cavity Caves

Brushing your teeth is something you do every day it could be considered as mundane. However by doing so you save your teeth from DECAY.

Brush your way to victory and save the tooth!
